summary:
SoulMaster\'s Fire Arrows - You know you want some!
NEW!! Awesome HD Texture set for the Quiver and Arrows by ewi65!
When fired the Arrows leave a flaming trail through the air, then explode on impact! 
They look awesome at night! NOW!! New Optional Texture available
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/FireLogo1_zpsa850e661.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/FireTitle_zps4bda2127.jpg[/IMG]

[color=#00FFFF]SoulMaster\'s Fire Arrows - You know you want some!

The Arrow for the Discerning Pyromaniac![/color]

Thank you for downloading and trying SoulMaster\'s Fire Arrows.

[color=#00FFFF]NEW!! Excellent HD Texture set for the Quiver and Arrows by ewi65!
Also NEW!! If you prefer I have uploaded an optional Texture set for a Black Quiver (download and confirm yes to overwrite when asked)[/color]

[color=#FFFF00]When fired the Arrows leave a flaming trail through the air, then explode on impact! 
They look awesome at night![/color]

[color=#00FF00]These Arrows are craftable at any forge - you need the Steel Smithing perk.
5 Firewood 1 Fire Salts and 1 Steel Ingot will craft 12 Arrows.

They are also available throughout Skyrim as they are level listed.[/color]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/Fire2_zps24e3d98c.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/FireInstall_zps48f18dd9.jpg[/IMG]

[color=#FFFF00]Installation:
For ease of installation, download and install wih the Nexus Mod Manager.
If installing manually, copy the .esp and Meshes and Textures folders into your Skyrim\\Data Folder[/color]

[color=#FF0000]Version History:
V1.0 Initial release.
V1.2 Re-textured Quiver and Arrows
V1.3 New texture set by ewi65[/color]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/FireCredits_zps48ef5175.jpg[/IMG]

[color=#00FF00]Credits and Thanks:
A massive thank you to ewi65 for letting me use his HD Textures for this Mod
Please give him a visit and endorse his work!! 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27898/]ewi65[/url][/color]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/Faq_zps5dcbcf03.jpg[/IMG]

[color=#FFFF00]FAQ

Q Why are the arrows not retrievable after being fired?
A They explode on impact thus destroying the arrow!

Q Why is the texture on the quiver so horrible?
A I\'m not the best at texturing, this is my first attempt at it! (although I am quite pleased with the look of the arrows)
A2 Now I have re-textured everything hopefully they look a little better?!
A3 Now ewi65 has done the textures they are totally awesome!!

Q I\'m forever running out of Firewood to craft the Arrows and there\'s just not always a handy woodblock - can you help?
A Well, funnily enough I can! Try my almost famous SoulMasters Gather Wood spell here:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27591/] SoulMasters Gather Wood Spell[/url][/color]

Future upgrades:
I am working on having the arrow tip flaming when loaded in the Bow (proving taxing for my limited skills!)

I hope you enjoy using the Fire Arrows.

If you have any comments, or bug reports please let me know.

If you think this mod is Lore breaking, not suitable for you etc. then please just move on to the next mod!

[color=#00FFFF]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

SoulMasterII

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]
[color=#FFFF00]Please, DO NOT upload any part of my mods anywhere else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII

files.name: SoulMasters Fire Arrows V1-2
files.changelogHtml: Re-textured the Quiver and Arrows (the old one was awful!)
